description: Application under Section 73  to vary Condition 2 (Drawings) - Increase in height of building and  minor changes that affect the external appearance of the building attached to planning permission  17/02924/FUL Dated 10/11/2017 which granted permission for 'Demolition of various structures to the rear of the property, installation of two lightwells to the front of the property, construction of a ground floor and first floor rear extension, construction of a third storey to No. 7 Windmill Lane, construction of a mansard roof and the erection of a two storey building to the rear to facilitate the change of use of the existing locally listed buildings from a workshop with associated office use and sui generis HMO to create 9 residential units, consisting of 3x3 bed, 1x2 bed and 5x1 bed flats'.
